EmailTemplate.name: SPYDR Lightbar Hot Swap
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with one of your lights!
Before we proceed with initiating a warranty claim, I would like to do a little troubleshooting with you to determine exactly what is causing the issue. If you have not already done so, can please try swapping the faulty light bar to a different power lead on your fixture's central console and let me know if the issue persists?
I look forward to hearing back from you!
